title: How Do I Get On The PBE
body: i have played this game for a year now and i still haven't got on the pbe, is there any possible way for me to get on the pbe other than waiting, i want to help and i play the game a lot and if i got on i would send feedback for each patch but at this point i don't think ill ever get on unless i say something. if your a rioter please message me back if there is any way i can help or do something to get on the pbe faster.

replies.body: There's no way to force an application through.  I don't have any information expediting applications beyond what's provided in our [PBE guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ).  I appreciate your interest, and wish you the best of luck with admissions!
